page.title: 14LONGMORE CAMP
page.content: Longmore Camp is fully equipped to train cadets to fight and survive. Training contains uses of weapons,vehicles,and survival courses, another piece of training equipment is the extremely difficult assault course.This consists of walls to climb ropes to swing on, water to jump and frames to climb. Another part is to be added soon and this will be tunnels to crawl through. The recuits use the woodland behind to train in, using weapons,vehicles and ration foods. These ration foods are in tins and water-proofed packed, and the types of food there are is: pate, beans, vegetables,water and various assortments of nourishing biscuits. The residents live in houses at the far end of the camp, a Naffi is also a part of the camp where all the soldiers eat and drink.
